snippet: Gov. Jerry Brown disappointed many after he vetoed a bill aimed at keeping harmless immigrants out of the deportation dragnet.
abstract: Editorial criticizes California Gov Jerry Brown for vetoing the Trust Act, bill aimed at keeping harmless immigrants out of the deportation dragnet; contends that when police become immigration officers, they lose the trust of communities that are a key component in fighting crime.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Jerry Brown disappointed many after he vetoed a bill aimed at keeping harmless immigrants out of the deportation dragnet.
